## Filters.RangeInputProps.getDisplayName property

Returns the display name based on the range's start and end values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDisplayName?: (start?: LowerNumberRangeLimit, end?: UpperNumberRangeLimit) => string;
```
